scan_metadata.note: The Illinois ICash database (icash.illinoistreasurer.gov) blocks automated access via CloudFront bot protection. Manual searching or FOIA request required.

recommendations: FOIA request to Illinois State Treasurer's Office
Contact Illinois State Treasurer for bulk data access

data_to_extract.property_type: e.g., Cash, Check, Security, Insurance, etc.
data_to_extract.claim_url: Direct link to claim page with property ID
data_to_extract.additional_info: Address, holder name, date reported if available

foia_request_info.data_requested: All unclaimed properties in Cook County (zip codes 60601-60699) with values exceeding $1,000
foia_request_info.preferred_format: CSV or JSON with property owner name, dollar amount, property type, property ID, and last known address
foia_request_info.legal_basis: Illinois Freedom of Information Act (5 ILCS 140)
